    S00=1=S01S_{0}^{0}=1=S_{0}^{1} S00​=1=S01​

    and at the end of the period, time 1 , the share is worth

    S11={a if the period was bad, b if the period was indifferent c if the period was good S_{1}^{1}= \begin{cases}a & \text { if the period was bad, } \\ b & \text { if the period was indifferent } \\ c & \text { if the period was good }\end{cases} S11​=⎩⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎧​abc​ if the period was bad,  if the period was indifferent  if the period was good ​

    where a<b<ca<b<ca<b<c. The bond is always worth 1 at the end of the period. Show that there is no arbitrage in this market if and only if a<1<ca<1<ca<1<c.
